Fruit and vegetables
As well as vitamins and minerals, fruit and vegetables 
provide	fibre,	which	helps	digestion	and	prevents	
constipation.	Eat	at	least	five	portions	of	fresh,	frozen,	
canned, dried or juiced fruit and vegetables each 
day. Always wash them carefully. To get the most 
out of vegetables, donâ€™t over cook them. For more 
information and portion sizes,  visit pha.site/5-a-day
Dried should only be eaten at mealtimes to reduce the risk of tooth
